name: Police Karate Fighting Warrior
description:
Here we bring for you a new era of real police fighting 3d, the brand new police fighting game. Control your real police fighting 3d simulator 2020 and destroy your opponent in this new fighting battle, the real aroma of police fighting!

This futuristic battle will give you the real fighting experience. In this stunning ring fighting game, you’ll test your controlling skills of a fighting simulator and its Combos.

This is a new generous of police battle games with the patch up of police fighting games with ring fighting and new Combat Style. In this police fighting games, you will face melodramatic characters ring fight 3d. This brilliant fighting games will give you the pro practice of best police fighting games 3d.

How To Play:
- Choose your favorite character as well choose a strong rival
- Select your favorite arena for combo fighting.
- There are two rounds in each battle. Win both rounds to continue the wrestle fight.
- Defeat your opponent in this Tekken 3 fighting game.
- Be a real policeman ring fighter to win a battle game.

Features:
• Police Ring Fighting
• Unleash New Opponent to Fight
• Different police Player to Choose
• Real 3d Graphics and environment
• Smooth on-screen controls
• Amazing, Thrilling and Stunning gameplay levels
• Punch, Jab Punch, Super Punch, Kick, Super Kick, Flip Kick
• Brilliant Sound Effects you will definitely like
• Fantastic and different fighting animation, Punches and Kicks

Awesome sounds effects in this game including timer & other things that make you feel that as you are watching a real fight, live stream just in the other wrestling matches.

So what are you waiting for? Let’s download the world's top police wrestling competition game to enjoy the real fighting experience in police karate fighting 3D Game.
